Item.name: Vintage Oni Helmet
Item.description: A fearsome, ancient helmet in immaculate condition, made by a long-gone craftsman. Not as protective as any modern armor, but it inspires great courage in the wearer.

Item.name: Vintage Oni Suit
Item.description: A vintage, yet almost pristine suit of carefully crafted armor, made by an ancient craftsman. It's not quite as protective as modern armors, but bolsters the wearer's will greatly, making them move with - reportedly - demonic fury.

Item.name: Vintage Oni Helmet
Item.description: A fearsome, ancient helmet in immaculate condition, made by a long-gone craftsman. Not as protective as any modern armor, but it inspires great courage in the wearer.

Item.name: Vintage Oni Suit
Item.description: A vintage, yet almost pristine suit of carefully crafted armor, made by an ancient craftsman. It's not quite as protective as modern armors, but bolsters the wearer's will greatly, making them move with - reportedly - demonic fury.

Item.name: Visored Brass Helmet
Item.description: An ancient style of brass helmet from Terra, with a short visor to protect the eyes and face. An odd thing to wear in the modern day, but protective nonetheless.

Item.name: Sallet Helmet
Item.description: An ancient steel helmet.

Item.name: Horned Brass Helmet
Item.description: A large, ancient horned brass helmet from Terra. Quite an odd thing to wear in a submarine, but protective nonetheless.

Item.name: Ornate Brass Helmet
Item.description: An extremely ornate ancient steel-brass helmet, from Terra. Very impressive, but odd, to wear.

Item.name: Masked Brass Helmet
Item.description: An ancient style of brass helmet from Terra, with a short visor to protect the eyes and face. An odd thing to wear in the modern day, but protective nonetheless.

Item.name: Brass Armor
Item.description: An ancient chestplate made of rust-resistant brass, still quite protective of the vitals against the beasts of the sea, but an odd sight to behold in casual wear.

Item.name: Cuirass
Item.description: An ancient chestplate made of rust-resistant brass, still quite protective of the vitals against the beasts of the sea, but an odd sight to behold in casual wear.

Item.name: Ornate Brass Armor
Item.description: An extremely ornate, ancient set of decorated brass-steel armor. Still rather quite protective, but more often a sight in theatre than in practical use.

Item.name: Ninja Outfit
Item.description: A dark, sneaky suit worn by ninja-wannabes. The lightweight fabric is deceptively strong, and also allows one to move swiftly due to its light weight, but it sogs badly and slows one down in water..

Item.name: Heavy Brass Armor
Item.description: An extremely ornate, ancient set of decorated brass-steel armor. Still rather quite protective, but more often a sight in theatre than in practical use.

Item.name: Ninja Mask
Item.description: A lightweight, wrapped dark cloth mask for sneaky assholes.

Item.name: Tanto
Item.description: A lightweight, relatively straight ancient single-edged dagger. Used to stab extremely quickly, rather than for slashing strikes.

Item.name: Ancient Spear
Item.description: A huge, sharp, ancient wood-shafted spear with a hooked bladed head, designed to impale targets from long reaches. It's a little impractically long for use aboard most watercraft, but it's thrusts allow it to be used even in confined spaces, so long as there's enough room between you and your target.

Item.name: Shortsword
Item.description: A heavy, broad-bladed yet short sword, designed to inflict great stabbing wounds against lightly armored targets rather than slash. Powerful and quick, but ineffective against heavy armor.

Item.name: Gladius
Item.description: An ancient short sword, designed to be swung for use against minimally armored targets. It's short size makes it very handy in tight confines, such as aboard a submarine.

Item.name: Sai
Item.description: A lightweight spiked weapon, designed to parry enemy's blades and deliver quick stabs to vital areas. It excels at penetrating armor, and can occasionally score a critical hit in vital locations.

Item.name: Wakizashi
Item.description: An extremely light, yet short single-edged bladed sword of ancient design. Surpsisingly effective in the close confines of a submarine, and it's light weight lets it be swung exceptionally quickly, though it lacks any real blunt force to stun enemies.

Item.name: Tachi
Item.description: A razor sharp, deceptively light and extremely long sword with a curved blade, popular among Seperatists, for whatever reason. Rather impractical for the tight confines of a submarine, though this blade is easily capable of cleaving a man to bits in a rapid flurry if it's alloted proper room to do so.

Item.name: Arming Sword
Item.description: A lightweight, relatively short one-handed double-edged sword deceptively well suited for the confines of a submarine. A relatively good choice for hacking through light armor and shells.

Item.name: Mancatcher
Item.description: A peculiar, hooked and spiked iron mechanism attached to a simple pole, designed to hold down troublemakers so that someone else can put them in shackles. It's also capable of holding down larger beasts, such as mudraptors, though only with great effort on the wielder's part, and the shallow spikes on the fragile mechanism are practically impossible to kill with.

Item.name: Longsword
Item.description: A long, well balanced double-edged sword, capable of cleaving through lightly armored men and creatures alike, though it's a bit unweildy for the confines of the average submarine.

Item.name: Medieval Crossbow
Item.description: An archaic wood and iron crossbow, designed to propel small bolts modest distances with great force behind them. Equally effective underwater as on land, though not as much so in the prior as a harpoon gun.

Item.name: Crossbow Bolt
Item.description: A light, sharp bolt designed to be fired from a crossbow. It travels roughly as well through water as in air, and stacks more easily than harpoons.

Item.name: Chitin Crossbow Bolt
Item.description: A lightweight, yet extremely sharp bolt crafted from a hard chunk of bright-orange chitin.

Item.name: Explosive Crossbow Bolt
Item.description: A rather heavy crossbow bolt tipped with a miniature explosive payload and impact detonator. Not superbly powerful, but cheaper than harpoons.

Item.name: Chainmail Hauberk
Item.description: A heavy, yet flexible suit of interlocked metal rings, forming a protective layer against stabs and bite wounds, making it - oddly - rather popular in Europa, though it slows one down notably both in water and on land.
